thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Hanger Lane Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: simple and reasonable price
thread.title_full: simple and reasonable price - Review of Premier Inn London Hanger Lane Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Athira M
title: simple and reasonable price
text: We only stayed there for two nights, because we were in town for a concert. The service is friendly and you feel very welcomed. The breakfast buffet was wide spreaded. There is something for everyone. The rooms are very simple, not to small, there is a hair dryer, towels, a big enough bathroom and a water heater. Not to mention the location: the hotel is nearby a bus station and a metro station (not even a 5 min walk). So you get easily to the city of London and the airport.
